name: GAMEBOX 2
description:
Download the @FreeAppADay.com App and wish for more top rated paid apps like GameBox 2 to become FREE for a day!

► ► ► ► ►

18 FULL GAMES, all in one AWESOME, FUN-FILLED PACKAGE!
the MOST SUCCESSFUL GAME COLLECTION on the APP STORE. PART 2.

► ► ► ► ►

• 18 HIGHLY-POLISHED GAMES.

• FULL GAME CENTER INTEGRATION.

• NEW GAMES ADDED w/ EVERY UPDATE.

► ► ► ► ►

Army Lines [WWII STRATEGY/LINE-DRAWING]
WWII is raging and the troops need a general. Draw up a strategy and lead them to victory!

Bowman War [ACTION/STRATEGY]
The bowmen are back, and this time it's war. Devise a strategy and command your troops in battle!

Castle Wars [ACTION/STRATEGY]
Dispatch troops, protect your castles, and conquer the enemy! Strategize and rule the land!

Coastal Super-Combat [ACTION/COAST DEFENSE]
The coast is under attack! Mow down invaders and defend your base!

Crazy John [ZOMBIE/DUAL-STICK SHOOTER]
The surface of the earth has been overrun by zombies. One man is going to do something about it...

Death Knight [ACTION/SIDE-SCROLLER]
Jump into this action-packed side-scroller and fight against the forces of evil!

Desert Slug [ACTION/MODERN WARFARE]
Grab 1 of 24 weapons, then run 'n gun through the desert and pwn some baddies!

Doodle Truck [ACTION/PHYSICS]
Pick up your payload, dip and dive, bounce and fly, then deliver in this physics adventure!

Elevator Zombies [ACTION/ARCADE]
Zombies are taking over and infecting everyone! Jump into the elevator and go save the city!

Enemy Alert! [STRATEGY/TOWER DEFENSE]
Times are dark and war is afoot… The enemy has discovered your secret base… Build defensive towers and stave off the threat!

Guns on Wheels [RACING/ARCADE]
Build a vehicle and hit the road in this high-caliber action racer.

Jailbreaker 2 [ACTION/PLATFORMER]
Continue to run from the cops in this sequel to the best-selling original, Jailbreaker!

Marine Mania [STRATEGY/LINE-DRAWING]
Hundreds of ships are coming into port! Direct them to the right dock and avert disaster in this line-drawing adventure!

Pixel Ninja [STEALTH/ACTION]
A precious heirloom has been taken by an evil warlord. Incensed, the leader of Pixel Village has called upon his mightiest warrior...

Spartans vs Vikings [STRATEGY/ACTION]
The Vikings have gone back in time and are invading Sparta! Grab weapons, unleash skills, and fight to the death in this action/strategy combo!

Super World Adventures [PLATFORMER/ADVENTURE]
Run, jump, and throw acorns! Cross rivers, climb mountains and more in this classic platforming adventure.

Tank Warz [ARTILLERY/STRATEGY]
Build a custom tank, pick the right weapons, and head to war!

TowrCraft [TOWER DEFENSE/STRATEGY]
The orcs invade! Dig in, build towers, strategize, and protect middle earth!

► ► ► ► ►
